<L>5540<pc>400-1<k1>kOnteya<k2>kOnteya<h>4
{@Kaunteya@}<sup>4</sup>¦ (do.) = Yudhiṣṭhira: I, 5284, 5820 ({%Y°%}), 5849,
6045 ({%Y°%}), 7226, 7245, 7249, 7271, 7553, 7568; II, 501,
1211, 1301, 1356, 1429, 1632, 1689, 1720, 1739, 1740, 1764,
1802, 1930, 2141, 2167, 2389, 2581, 2621 ({%Dharmaputro%}
{%Yudhiṣṭhiraḥ%}); III, 128, 211, 677, 750, 801, 815, 817, 843,
874, 899, †919 ({%Y°%}), 968 ({%Y°%}), 972, 1225, 1328, 1349, 1352,
†1363, 1378, 1399, 1445, 1913 ({%Dharmarājaṃ%}), 2088, 2130,
2773, 3030, 3081, 8318, 8338, 8340, 8383, 8405, 8411, 8438,
8444, 8458, 8498, 8540, 8630, 8662, 8686, 9968, 9981, 9983,
9986, 10098, 10113, 10123, †10247, 10309, 10311, 10422,
10469, 10516, 10534, 10549, 10588, †10601, †10691, 10698,
10699, 10772, 10793, 10820, 10823, 10829, 10831, 10862,
10863, 10994, 11444, 11445, 11524, 11553, 11739 ({%Ajāta-%}
{%śatruḥ%}), 11930, 11946, 12435 ({%Y°%}), 12444, 12630, 12763,
12796, 13002, 13009 ({%Y°%}), 13041, 13213 ({%Y°%}), 14694,
14838 ({%Y°%}), 15354 ({%Y°%}), 15356, 15488, 17235 ({%Y°%}),
17316, 17327, 17431, 17434; IV, 57, 150, 642, 2225, 2348;
V, 48, 53, 126, 1972, 2214 ({%Y°%}), 2288 ({%Y°%}), 2484 ({%Y°%}),
2955, 5240, 5415, 5416, 5547, 7581, 7622 ({%Y°%}); VI, 696,
1574, 1588, 1616, 3698, 3798, 4654, 5189 ({%Y°%}); VII, 317
({%rājānaṃ%}; PCR. wrongly = {%Bhīmasena%}), 2923, 2932, 2936,
2946, 3529 ({%Ajātaśatruṃ%}), 3983 (only B., C. has {%Kaikeyena%}),
4174 ({%Ajātaśatruḥ%}), 4331, 6484, 6963, 7273, 8317, 9231;
VIII, 2356, 2976 ({%Dharmarājaṃ Yudhiṣṭhiraṃ%}), 2986,
3187, 3207 ({%Y°%}), 3308, 5031; IX, 557 ({%Ajātaśatruṃ%}
{%Yudhiṣṭhiraṃ%}), 844, 851, 1012, 1188, 1718 ({%Ajātaśatruḥ%}),
1759, 1783; X, 551; XI, 230; XII, 384 ({%Dharmarāje%}
{%Yudhiṣṭhire%}), 452, 476, 606, 620, 627, 651 ({%Pāṇḍavaḥ%}),
663, 698 ({%Ajātaśatruṃ%}), 703, 732 ({%Y°%}), 832, 1150, 1158,
